content: Up for auction are 3 lotsLot 1: Supreme 5 poker chip setLot 2: Supreme 5 poker chip setoriginal sales thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1711309.0Lot 3: Supreme 3 coin set - set is #69 - all coins matching numbersSTARTING BID PER LOT: .001 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001 BTC END TIME: Sunday, August 6th, 15:00 (3:00 pm) EST**Payment due within 48 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid - per lot.Basically, auction ends at the appointed time - unless extended - if extended the auction ends once 5 minutes elapse with no bids - per lot.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC and only to this address: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4es Bitcoin via LN to this address: moparmining@walletofsatoshi.com - if need an LNURL or invoice instead of LN address - just let me know.if you get an unsolicited pm to pay any other way - IGNORE IT, it will not be from me.SHIPPING:Shipping can be done in one of three methods:1. directly by me - add an additional $5 to the bid amount when paying if you want a direct shipment.2. item can be hodl'd by me for consolidation with future orders/sales.3. item can be provided to minerjones for consolidation with other orders and reshipping. There is no fee for me to provide them to minerjones.
